name: Dungman The Dungeon Crawler (Playdate)
description:
Dungman The Dungeon Crawler, is a short fast pace, score based dungeon crawler for the playdate handheld. Make it through many different rooms dodging and defeating enemies to gain better score all while making the decision to grab a potion that could aid or hinder your journey. 

More paths and content is planned :)

Game was made in pulp for the playdate.
